name: Prison Break - Freedom Jail Puzzle
description:
Dark Themed Game
Food for the Mind
Improvised Puzzle Game
_________________________

No wants to be a convict, but everybody loves, movies, games based on jail breaks. Here’s come another exciting and thrilling game in the same niche. The concept of jail break is combined with old puzzle game and the result is this spectacular game; Prison Break
.
One starting point and one finish point, and a jumbled boxy path in between. You have to rearrange the tiles in order to create a pathway for your game character (prisoner) from the starting point to the finish point so he can easily escape from the prison. Sounds interesting, doesn’t it? You can slide the tiles to left, right, up and down. The path may be horizontal, vertical or slant. Move the tiles by touching them and sliding them in the direction you want to move them. The puzzle gets complex with each level. It is a good exercise game for the brain.

+++Game Features+++
Multilevel puzzle game
Interesting graphics and theme
Brain Booster
